original_text: And they began to accuse him, saying, We found this fellow perverting the nation, and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar, saying that he himself is Christ a King.
korean_text: 고발하여 이르되 우리가 이 사람을 보매 우리 백성을 미혹하고 가이사에게 세금 바치는 것을 금하며 자칭 왕 그리스도라 하더이다 하니

sentences.original_text: And they began to accuse him, saying,
We found this fellow perverting the nation,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 이 사람이 나라를 호리는 것을 발견하였나이다

sentences.original_text: and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar,
saying that he himself is Christ a King.
